TextLibrary.Text: Khalkus
You must be Khalkus.
You must be Khalkus.
You must be Khalkus.
You must be Khalkus.
Aye, and ye would be the one sent by the Queen, eh? Well my thanks to ye, lad, thanks indeed. We definitely need some help. 'Tis a miracle, a miracle it is! I canna say what an absolute...

Khalkus, please...
Khalkus, please...
Khalkus, please...
Khalkus, please...

Oh. Sorry, lad. Sorry about that. Ye've come to help and that be good enough for me. I've been sitting here waiting, trying to design a new mobile catapult that will help us to distract the hordes of Ogres besiegin' Dhun-Kor. Hundreds o' the beasts there are and I...

Oh. Sorry, lad. Sorry about that. Ye've come to help and that be good enough for me. I've been sitting here waiting, trying to design a new mobile catapult that will help us to distract the hordes of Ogres besiegin' Dhun-Kor. Hundreds o' the beasts there are and I...

Oh. Sorry, lass. Sorry about that. Ye've come to help and that be good enough for me. I've been sitting here waiting, trying to design a new mobile catapult that will help us to distract the hordes of Ogres besiegin' Dhun-Kor. Hundreds o' the beasts there are and I...
Wait a minute! Did you say 'hordes'?
Wait a minute! Did you say 'hordes'?
Wait a minute! Did you say 'hordes'?
Wait a minute! Did you say 'hordes'?
Oh, aye, the hordes that are siegin' Dhun-Kor. Ogres everywhere, and a huge two-headed brute leadin' 'em into battle, the likes o' which I've not seen before...
Oh, aye, the hordes that are siegin' Dhun-Kor. Ogres everywhere, and a huge two-headed brute leadin' 'em into battle, the likes o' which I've not seen before...
Oh, aye, the hordes that are siegin' Dhun-Kor. Ogres everywhere, and a huge two-headed brute leadin' 'em into battle, the likes o' which I've not seen before...
Oh, aye, the hordes that are siegin' Dhun-Kor. Ogres everywhere, and a huge two-headed brute leadin' 'em into battle, the likes o' which I've not seen before...
But I thought we were protecting a caravan?
But I thought we were protecting a caravan?
But I thought we were protecting a caravan?
But I thought we were protecting a caravan?

Oh, the Caravan... aye. We keep tryin' to send metal from the mountains in the south through Agaria and over the Hammer Pass to Dhun-Kor. Every time it gets near Theira, Undead raid the wagons and take it all. I have no idea what Undead actually want with metal, mind ye, but I'm thinkin' that...

Oh, the Caravan... aye. We keep tryin' to send metal from the mountains in the south through Agaria and over the Hammer Pass to Dhun-Kor. Every time it gets near Theira, Undead raid the wagons and take it all. I have no idea what Undead actually want with metal, mind ye, but I'm thinkin' that...
So we must go to Theira and see this Caravan safely through?
So we must go to Theira and see this Caravan safely through?
So we must go to Theira and see this Caravan safely through?
So we must go to Theira and see this Caravan safely through?

Oh, aye. As we travel, I can tell ye about this catapult. 'Tis a thing o' absolute beauty it is, at least twice the length o' standard catapults, with gears made o' pure Adamantium. Well maybe not quite pure, but near enough to be...

Khalkus...let's get going.
